about_the_game:
Globulo offers an immersive experience with an exciting storyline:

You embody Bop, a small Leucobot in search of meaning. Following a mysterious event jeopardizing his life, Bop realizes how ephemeral life can be. Reflecting on his mortality, our little hero realizes he never truly knew what he wanted to do with his life... It's time for him to take his destiny into his own hands!

After receiving a mysterious power, Bop can awaken Globulos, incredible creatures with mystical powers. Bop then embarks on a dangerous quest to rid the world of the looming threat... Along his journey, Bop will encounter many new, endearing companions and evolve alongside them.

This version is a demo that contains the first part of the world to explore. This demo will teach you the basics of combat: dodging, resource management, item usage, and optimizing your build.

You will also encounter other endearing characters like Beep or Grade. You will encounter them again along with many others throughout your adventures.

Regarding the gameplay, Globulo stands out for its rich and varied gameplay, but above all, its uniqueness! You must compose a team of 3 Globulos, each with different abilities. Find the best combinations, but especially those that fit your playstyle.

short_description: Globulo is a Metroidvania blended with Bullet Hell elements. Hand-drawn, Globulo invites you to immerse yourself in a strange microscopic world corrupted by infections that threaten the world!
